tuv.seg: The Junior Certificate examination is held at the end of the Junior Cycle in post-primary schools
Reáchtáltar scrúdú an Teastais Shóisearaigh ag deireadh na Sraithe Sóisearaí in iar-bhunscoileana
The Junior Cycle caters for students aged from 12 to 15 years and students normally sit the exam at the age of 14 or 15, after 3 years of post-primary education
Déanann daltaí idir 12 agus 15 freastal ar an tSraith Shóisearach agus is iondúil go seasann daltaí an scrúdú agus iad 14 nó 15 bliana d’aois agus trí bliana d’oideachas iar-bhunscoile faighte acu
However, the Junior Certificate is not limited to post-primary school students
Ina dhiaidh sin féin, ní do dhaltaí iar-bhunscoile amháin an Teastas Sóisearach

A candidate following an approved course of study outside the State or who is attending an approved course of study organised under the Vocational Training Opportunities Scheme, adult literacy and community education schemes, the Department of Social Protection's Back to Education scheme for the unemployed or a similar scheme, may also sit the exams

Is féidir le hiarrthóir atá ag leanacht chúrsa ceadaithe taobh amuigh den Stát nó atá ag freastal ar chúrsa staidéir ceadaithe arna rith faoi Scéim Deiseanna Gairmoiliúna, scéimeanna litearthachta d’aosaigh agus Scéimeanna Oideachais Pobail, scéim dara leibhéal na Roinne Coimirce Sóisialaí do dhaoine dífhostaithe nó scéim dá leithéid na scrúduithe a sheasamh chomh maith
There is information about continuing education schemes elsewhere on this website
Tá tuilleadh eolais faoi na scéimeanna le fáil
Changes to the Junior Cycle
Athruithe ar an tSraith Shóisearach
The Junior Certificate will be replaced with the Junior Cycle Student Award (JCSA)
Ionadófar an Teastas Sóisearach le Gradam Scoláire na Sraithe Sóisearaí (JCSA)
There will be a school-work component to the assessment which will be based on work completed by the student during second and third year
Beidh comhpháirt oibre scoile i gceist leis an measúnacht a bheidh bunaithe ar obair a chuir an dalta i gcrích sa dara bliain agus sa tríú bliain
Students in second year will sit standardised tests in Maths and English reading (or Irish reading in Irish-medium schools)
Déanfaidh daltaí sa dara bliain trialacha caighdeánaithe i Matamaitic agus i léitheoireacht Bhéarla (nó i léitheoireacht Ghaeilge i nGaelscoileanna)
Standardised testing in Science will also be included
Cuirfear triail chaighdeánaithe in Eolaíocht san áireamh freisin
The National Council for Curriculum and Assessment is developing a new report card for parents which will give them much more information about their son or daughter’s learning progress
Tá cárta tuairisce nua do thuismitheoirí á fhorbairt ag an gComhairle Náisiúnta Curaclaim agus Measúnachta lena dtabharfar níos mó faisnéise dóibh faoi dhul chun cinn foghlama a mic nó a n-iníne
More information about the changes to the Junior Cycle is available on the Department of Education’s website
Tá tuilleadh faisnéise faoi na hathruithe ar an tSraith Shóisearach ar fáil ar láithreán Gréasáin na Roinne Oideachais
There is a wide range of subjects available, but all subjects are not offered in every school
Tá raon leathan ábhar ar fáil, ach ní thairgtear gach ábhar i ngach scoil
The Department of Education and Skills publishes syllabus and curriculum information
Foilsíonn an Roinn Oideachais agus Scileanna faisnéis siollabais agus churaclaim
The National Council for Curriculum and Assessment provides a list of Junior Certificate subjects
Cuireann an Chomhairle Náisiúnta Curaclaim agus Measúnachta liosta d’ábhair Theastais Shóisearaigh ar fáil
All students must follow courses in Irish (except where exemptions apply), English, Mathematics and Civic, Social and Political Education
Ní mór do gach dalta leanúint le cúrsaí i nGaeilge (gan cásanna ina bhfuil díolúintí i bhfeidhm a áireamh), i mBéarla, i Matamaitic agus in Oideachas Saoránach, Sóisialta agus Polaitiúil
There may be other compulsory subjects, depending on the type of school
Is féidir gurb ann d’ábhair éigeantacha eile, ag brath ar an gcineál scoile
Examinations in a number of other EU languages are offered to students who meet certain criteria
Tairgtear scrúduithe i roinnt de theangacha eile an AE do dhaltaí a chomhlíonann critéir áirithe
│Percentage Range │Grade │
│Raon céatadáin │Grád │

│85 nó níos mó │A │

│70 ach níos lú ná 85 │B │

│55 ach níos lú ná 70 │C │

│40 ach níos lú ná 55 │D │

│25 ach níos lú ná 40 │E │

│10 ach níos lú ná 25 │F │

You can find the timetables for the Junior Certificate written examinations (pdf) and for the practical course work (pdf) as well as the Junior Certificate examination papers on the website of the State Examinations Commission

Is féidir leat na cláir ama le haghaidh scrúduithe scríofa an Teastais Shóisearaigh (pdf) agus le haghaidh na hoibre cúrsa praiticiúla (pdf) mar aon le scrúdpháipéir an Teastais Shóisearaigh a fháil ar láithreán Gréasáin Choimisiún na Scrúduithe Stáit
Students sitting for the Junior Certificate must pay an examination fee
Ní mór do dhaltaí atá ag seasamh an Teastais Shóisearaigh táille an scrúdaithe a íoc
In early February of the exam year, the school sends parents who are paying the examination fee a form
I Feabhra don bhliain scrúdaithe seolann an scoil foirm chuig na tuismitheoirí atá ag íoc na táille
The parent makes the payment through a bank and the bank must stamp the form
Íocann tuismitheoir an táille tríd an mbanc agus ní mór stampa an bhainc a bheith ar an bhfoirm
The parent then returns the form to the school
Seolann an tuismitheoir an fhoirm ar ais chuig an scoil ansin
Students whose parent or guardian holds a current medical card do not have to pay the fee
Ní gá do dhaltaí a bhfuil a dtuismitheoir nó a gcaomhnóir i seilbh chárta leighis an táille a íoc
In the case of parents who have a current medical card, details of the medical card are put on the form and the parent then sends the form back to the school
Sa chás go bhfuil cárta leighis reatha ag tuismitheoirí, líontar sonraí faoin gcárta leighis ar an bhfoirm agus seolann an tuismitheoir an fhoirm ar ais chun na scoile ansin
The examination fee for the Junior Certificate in 2017 is €109
Is ionann táille scrúdaithe an Teastais Shóisearaigh in 2017 €109
The examination fee for VTOS (Vocational Training Opportunities Scheme) and similar students is as follows:
Seo a leanas an táille scrúdaithe i gcás dhaltaí SDGO (Scéim Deiseanna Gairmoiliúna) agus a leithéidí:
• Mix of Leaving Certificate/Junior Certificate subjects (3+) is €116
• Meascán d’ábhair Ardteistiméireachta agus Teastais Shóisearaigh (3+): €116
• Junior Certificate (3+ subjects) is €109
• An Teastas Sóisearach (3+ ábhar): €109
• 1 or 2 subjects - Leaving Certificate or Junior Certificate or mix of both is €71
• 1 nó 2 ábhar - AT/TS/meascán den phéire: €71
The State Examinations Commission manages and adminsters the State Certificate Examinations including the:
Is é Coimisiún na Scrúduithe Stáit a dhéanann bainistíocht agus riarachán ar Scrúduithe Teastais an Stáit, ina measc:
• Leaving Certificate Vocational Programme
• Clár Gairme na hArdteistiméireachta
Appealing your results: If you wish to appeal your examination results, you should apply through your school
Achomharc a dhéanamh in aghaidh do thorthaí: más mian leat achomharc a dhéanamh in aghaidh do thorthaí scrúduithe, caithfidh tú iarratas trí do scoil a dhéanamh
The appeal fee is €32 per subject which is refunded if your result is upgraded
Is an táille achomharc é €32 an t-ábhar agus má tá do thorthaí uasghrádaithe beidh an táille aisíoctha duit
To request a certified statement of examination results you can either apply in writing or download and complete the application form
Más mian leat ráiteas deimhnithe faoi thorthaí scrúdaithe a iarraidh, is féidir sin a dhéanamh i scríbhinn nó foirm iarratais a íoschóipeáil agus a líonadh isteach
Your application should specify the following personal details:
Ba cheart go dtabharfaí na sonraí pearsanta seo a leanas i d’iarratas:
• Name at the time of the examination (if different)
• Ainm tráth an scrúdaithe (murar ionann sin agus d’ainm anois)
• Name and address of school attended
• Ainm agus Seoladh na Scoile ar ar freastalaíodh
• Examination number (if known)
• Scrúduimhir (más eol duit í)
Forward your completed application form together with the appropriate fee to the State Examinations Commission
Seoltar an fhoirm iarratais líonta maraon leis an táille chuí go dtí Coimisiún na Scrúduithe Stáit
